name: Make The King
description:
Gameplay Description:
A game set on a chess board where the player is on the white team and has to
merge the same pieces to form the king carefully while avoiding the black
pieces to merge.

Rules:
• The player can move the chess pieces in all the four directions: left,
right, up and down.
• The player can only merge two same chess pieces into a rank higher than
them.
• As the player merges two chess pieces, two new chess pieces are
dropped on the chess board, of which, one represents white and one
represents black. The newly unlocked pieces are random.
• The player’s pieces’ movements will also make the opponents pieces’
move allowing them to also merge whenever possible.


 Merge chain:
▪ 2 pawns -> Rook.
▪ 2 Rooks -> Knight.
▪ 2 Knights -> Bishop.
▪ 2 Bishops -> Queen.
▪ 2 Queens -> King.

Win/Lose Conditions:
• The player wins the game if he is able to merge the chess pieces and
successfully make the king.
• The player loses the game if the black team merges the chess pieces and
makes the king.
